summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is crucial to investigate and resolve the issues causing the failure to ensure optimal user experience.
insights: The pricing page has the lowest load time (266.2 ms) and Time to First Byte (TTFB) (47.5 ms) among the pages, suggesting efficient server-side processing and optimized resources.
The blog page has a higher TTFB (122.8 ms) than the pricing page but still within an acceptable range. This could be due to additional database queries or server-side processing for dynamic content.
The homepage has a higher FCP (527.9 ms) than the pricing and blog pages, indicating that initial content rendering could be improved. However, the overall load time is still reasonable.
